articles.title: Scarlett Johansson's AI row has echoes of Silicon Valley's bad old days - BBC.com
articles.description: A clash with the actor has echoes of the macho tech giants of the past, says Zoe Kleinman.
articles.content:
Move fast and break things is a motto that continues to haunt the tech sector, some 20 years after it was coined by a young Mark Zuckerberg.

articles.title: iPhone 16 Pro leaks: Larger megapixel count and new reflective technology expected | Mint - Mint

articles.title: Heavy rain floods Kochi's tech hub, IMD issues red alert for five districts in Kerala - Onmanorama
articles.description: A 70-year-old man died of lightning strike at Bangalam in Kasaragod district.
articles.content:
With rain intensifying throughout the state, the India Meteorological Department (IMD) has put five districts on red alert.
